title: Grant Flight
content:
Grant Flight Lvl 3 Transmutation Bestow the ability to Fly upon yourself or an ally. 10 turns Melee Concentration ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot

Lvl 3 Transmutation

Bestow the ability to Fly upon yourself or an ally.

Melee Concentration

ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot

Grant Flight is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Grant Flight is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
